Name: No Cure
About the game: Step into the shoes of Jon. A police officer in 1984 at the beginning of a zombie outbreak. An adventurer found a mysterious worm that once brought to the city creates a flood of zombies and could lead to the end of the world. You must explore the city, find health and guns to survive. From the creator of the smash hit DIMETROSAUR. No Cure is a top down shooter where the zombies are fast and bounce off the walls. Zombies can infect citizens quickly turning them and creating a larger threat. The player will be searching for health packs and ammo while proceeding to the next story objective.
